original_text: So the Lord Jesus said to him, ‘You Pharisees are like someone who only cleans the outside of his cup and his plate. You only clean the part that people can see. But inside, your mind is full of bad thoughts. You like to take things from other people.
korean_text: 주께서 이르시되 너희 바리새인은 지금 잔과 대접의 겉은 깨끗이 하나 너희 속에는 탐욕과 악독이 가득하도다

sentences.original_text: So the Lord Jesus said to him
who only cleans the outside of his cup and his plate
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 잔과 접시의 겉만 깨끗이 하는 사람과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: You only clean the part that people can see
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 사람들이 볼 수 있는 부분만 깨끗이 합니다

sentences.original_text: But inside, your mind is full of bad thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 속에는 너희의 마음이 나쁜 생각으로 가득합니다

sentences.original_text: You like to take things from other people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 다른 사람들의 것을 빼앗는 것을 좋아합니다
